prompt:
In ~/Work/ostui add [g] graph hint to footer of detail models that support the graph view.

FIRST: bash go build ./... 2>&1 | head -5

For each file below, find the last return in View() that shows the main table
(the line with [esc] back) and add [g] graph to it.

FILE 1: internal/ui/storage/volume_detail_model.go
bash grep -n "esc.*back\|back.*esc" internal/ui/storage/volume_detail_model.go | tail -3
Add [g] graph before [esc] back.

FILE 2: internal/ui/network/floating_ip_detail_model.go
bash grep -n "esc.*back\|back.*esc" internal/ui/network/floating_ip_detail_model.go | tail -3
Add [g] graph before [esc] back.

FILE 3: internal/ui/network/network_subnets_model.go
bash grep -n "esc.*back\|back.*esc" internal/ui/network/network_subnets_model.go | tail -3
Add [g] graph before [esc] back.

FILE 4: internal/ui/loadbalancer/detail.go
bash grep -n "esc.*back\|back.*esc" internal/ui/loadbalancer/detail.go | tail -3
Add [g] graph before [esc] back.

VERIFY: bash go build ./... 2>&1
Build must stay green.
Output <promise>COMPLETE</promise> when done.
